title: Sepak takraw
summary: Sepak Takraw, or Sepaktakraw,[2] also called kick volleyball, is a team sport played with a rattan (synthetic plastic ball) between two teams of two to four players on a court resembling a badminton court.[3][4] It shares similarities to volleyball and footvolley with its use of a rattan ball and allowing players to use only their feet, knees, shoulders, chest and head to touch the ball.
